env_local: marine pelagic feature [ENVO:01000044];marine water body [ENVO:00001999];costal water body [ENVO:02000049]
organization: Toralla Marine Science Station - Centre of Marine Research, University of Vigo
extra_site_info: This site is located at the marina of the ECIMAT marine station, where there is a real-time monitoring station for environmental variables (with a 8 years-long time series). This point is in the same estuary where OSD has been conducted since 2018. Harmful algal blooms are periodically detected in the region during the summer months and it is located in an upwelling region, so phytoplankton blooms related to the upwelling events are frequent from March to September.
